pullrequest.title: Permit trigger slope to be specified for wait timeouts

content.raw:
Hey Russ,

You should go into your fork's settings and set 'default reviewers' to Phil and me. We configured this in mainline repos, but forks don't inherit the change if forked before the change was made, and pull request settings are stupidly based on the fork rather than the destination. Or you can manually add reviewers. Anyway I'm approving this since I know you've been using it for ages.
